summary: Flags non-playable weapons and ammo to be playable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=ffe691][size=15]Non-playable Weapons + Ammo[/size][/color][/b]

[b][color=bb0832][size=15][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GcRcw9qHE_E]Click Here For Video Demonstration or Watch Below![/url][/size][/color][/b]

[youtube]GcRcw9qHE_E[/youtube]

[b][color=5781bb]_info[/color][/b]: Flags non-playable weapons and ammo to be playable. Inspired by \'[b][color=ffe691][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=820]Non-playable Armor[/url][/color][/b]\' by gibbed!

[img]http://uploadingit.com/file/mefcsikgjts9hk4l/npwapft.png[/img]

[b][color=5781bb]_use[/color][/b]: In console type player.additem ID # (ID = ID of item listed below, # = amount)

236DD	TRAP DART
6DA4F	TRAP BALLISTA BOLT
73FE6	CW CATAPULT AMMO
7B932	DWARVEN SPHERE ARROW
7B935	DWARVEN SPHERE BOLT
109AB3	TRAP BALLISTA BOLT 2
109AB4	TRAP BALLISTA BOLT 3
109AB5	TRAP BALLISTA BOLT 4
109AB7	TRAP BALLISTA BOLT 5
109AB6	TRAP BALLISTA BOLT 6
10EC8C	DWARVEN SPHERE BOLT 2

17009	ENCHANTED DAEDRIC DREMORA SWORD OF FIRE
17288	DREMORA GREATSWORD OF FIRE
424F7	BOUND MYSTIC BATTLE AXE
424F8	BOUND MYSTIC BOW
424F9	BOUND MYSTIC SWORD
461DA	GIANT CLUB 1
58F5E	BOUND BATTLE AXE
58F5F	BOUND SWORD
58F60	BOUND BOW
7F6DF	DWARVEN SPHERE CROSSBOW
BA30E	BOUND SWORD RIGHT HAND
C334F	GIANT CLUB 2
CDEC9	GIANT CLUB 3
10EC8A	DWARVEN SPHERE CROSSBOW 2
10F9C6	KEENING
10FD5E	DAEDRIC MACE OF FIRE

[b][color=5781bb]_install[/color][/b]: Drop the .esp into your main Skyrim directory.

[b][color=5781bb]_uninstall[/color][/b]: Delete the file from directory.

[b][color=5781bb]_version history[/color][/b]:
Version 1.0 - 12/06/11 - Main version release
Flagged most non-playable weapons and ammo to be playable.

[b][color=5781bb]_done[/color][/b].

Check out the \'[b][color=ffe691][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=861]TRS Companions[/url][/color][/b]\' mod!

Check out the \'[b][color=ffe691][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=426]Grand Healing[/url][/color][/b]\' mod!

Check out the \'[b][color=ffe691][url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=509]Heal Other[/url][/color][/b]\' mod![/center]
author: focker7
